Element.name: ParameterBinding
Element.Description: A Parameter Binding is a value associated with a flow between components, which is transported, as an effect of the flow navigation, from the source component to the destination component.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The output parameter of the source component.
The input parameter of the target component or the <a href="/Reference/ElementsReference/WebModelElements/Variable"/> of the target page.
If checked, the input parameter is re-emitted as-is by the destination component.
The constant value assigned to the parameter binding.
